dct_description_sm: Map of southern Africa specially drawn by A.J. Clevely, F.R.G.S. for The story of the Cape to Cairo railway & river route from 1887 to 1922.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Miles" and "Kilometres."
Shows provinces, districts, localities, tribes, railways (existing, under construction and proposed) and roads.
Inset: index to the adjoining sections.
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
